item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

FRIDAY, DECEMBER 18 , at Holiday Inn Grand Ballroom, 929 Hingham St., Rockland. Exit 14, Rte. 228, off Rte. 3 south. (781)871-0545.
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by Award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres, free door prizes, raffles and MATCH GAME prizes.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES, 35-60 years old.
Cost is $12 all night.
Call (781)446-0234 for info.
Proper business dress required…sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club.

ALL UNWRAPPED CHILDREN'S TOY DONATIONS FOR 'TOYS-FOR-TOTS' APPRECIATED.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" CHRISTMAS PARTY & DANCE
